title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: 2. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) Regulations 2002
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) Regulations 2002 
(S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the 
definition of “Directive” (as amended by the European Communities (Seed of 
Fodder Plants) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No.453 of 2018)) the 
following: 

“’Directive’ means Council Directive 66/401/EEC of 14 June 1966 on 
the marketing of fodder plant seed2 (as amended by Council Directive 
69/63/EEC of 18 February 19693, Council Directive 71/162/EEC of 
30 March 19714, Council Directive 72/274/EEC of 20 July 19725, 
Council Directive 72/418/EEC of 6 December 19726, Council

79/641/EEC of 27 June 197913, Council Directive 79/692/EEC of 24 
July 197914, Commission Directive 80/754/EEC of 17 July 198015,

title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: 3. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) (Amendment)
text_raw:
3. The European Communities (Seed of Fodder Plants) (Amendment) 

Regulations 2018 (S.I. No.453 of 2018) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [198] 5
text_norm: 3 european community (seed fodder plants) (amendment) regulation 2018 (s.i no.453 2018) revoked given official seal 29 may 2020 michael creed minister agriculture food marine 198 5

title: (S.I. No. 198 of 2002) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by substituting for the
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
66/401/EEC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on seeds of 
fodder plants for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [198] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
